scripts.clean: rm dist chrome chrome.zip dist.zip -rf;mkdir -p dist;
scripts.zip: rm dist.zip;zip -X -r dist.zip dist/* && ls -l dist.zip
scripts.build: npm run copy & npm run css & npm run encode-levels; wait; npm run browserify; npm run build-phonegap;
scripts.deploy: npm run clean; npm run build;rsync -avz dist/* direct.ash.ms:/var/www/ash.ms/public_html/js13k2k15/
scripts.watch: npm run server & node node_modules/watch/cli.js 'npm run build' src/scripts --ignoreDotFiles
scripts.build-chrome: npm run clean;npm run build & cp src/chrome/ chrome/ -R;wait;cp dist/* chrome/ -R;cd chrome;zip ../chrome.zip -X -r *
scripts.build-firefox: npm run clean;npm run build & cp src/firefox/ firefox/ -R;wait;cp dist/* firefox/ -R;cd firefox;zip ../firefox.zip -X -r *
